p: Rahali et al. [ 93] studied the essential oil obtained from flower buds of Hertia cheirifolia and showed significant antioxidant activity along with the efficient acetylcholinesterase enzyme inhibitory activity for the prevention of AD. It was concluded that essential oil from flower buds of Hertia cheirifolia are rich in the anti-AChE activity of 1.86 mg Eq donepezil/g of essential oil due to the presence of Germacrene d.
